sub_title: Board Room Advisor - Innovation and Technology - Blockchain, Smart Contracts, DAO & Governance Expert - International Keynote Speaker
summary:
I help companies of all sizes to be prepared for upcoming technologies like Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Big Data and the impact on their business.
We train, do research, coach companies, from start up to corporate, Specialized in sustainable blockchain and smart contract implementations with special focus on governance. 

I am a key note speaker on blockchain and especially Smart Contracts. Besides I advise various blockchain start ups and  am very actively involved in the Dutch Blockchain Coalition

Prior I've worked in the finance sector, government sector, logistics sector, consumer goods manufacturing/production industry and health care industry. In these industries I obtained various experiences. In these industries I both worked as manager and on an individual basis as consultant.

Throughout my career I have obtained experience in:
- Managing sourcing, facilities, quality and commercial departments and project management offices.
- Strategy and Reorganization implementations
- Business Process Management,
- Project, Program and PMO management
- Business consultancy in process improvement (ToC, Lean, TQM, Six Sigma),
- Design and writing strategy and implementation/project plans,
- (Re-) Engineering of business processes (Based on TOC and Lean Manufacturing),
- Business Continuity Management /Crisis Management/Disaster Recovery in highly regulated environments,
- Records and Information Management
- Large scale IT and business projects (SEPA implementation, M&A deals, Bank Closure, etc)
- Development of a range of continuous improvement and data analysis tools,

Specialties: Blockchain, Business Process Management, Operations Management, SEPA, Business Process (re-)design, Lean and Six Sigma, Supply Chain Management/Architecture, Business & Management Consultancy, Project Management, PMO, Business Continuity Management, Records & Information Management.

treasury_media.title: BPM and Blockchain - miles apart or closer than you think?
treasury_media.description: My article on how BPM could be used in a blockchain environment as published on www.bpmleader.com!

treasury_media.title: My view on Business Process Management - Olivier Rikken
treasury_media.description: A summary of my view on Business Process Management. Feel free to contact me any time if you have any questions, want additional information or just want to have a good discussion around BPM and or Fintech!

profile_positions.description:
Providing various services to help companies of all sizes to be prepared for upcoming technologies like Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Big Data in a hands-on manner
These range from training, to indepth research and consultancy to coaching of companies, from start up to corporate.
profile_positions.title: Partner & Founder

profile_positions.description: The 2Tokens Foundation does theoretical and hands-on research towards practical opportunities and the regulatory side of tokenization. Creating regulatory token roadmaps and guiding explorative workgroups on various tokenization use cases, like tokenized invoicing and energy tokens. Responsible for research towards the regulatory token roadmap and  co-chair of the EuroStablecoin workgroup.
profile_positions.title: Board Member

company.name: TU Delft (Faculty TBM) - Nyenrode Business University - University of Curaçao

profile_positions.company: TU Delft (Faculty TBM) - Nyenrode Business University - University of Curaçao
profile_positions.description: Currently I am a lecturer and guest lecturer on blockchain, smart contracting and the effect on business models, governance and the legal aspects at 3 universities and various applied universities.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer & Guest lecturer

profile_positions.description: As member of the smart contract standardization group working on the TR 23455 and TS 23259 on smart contract standarization of the ISO.
profile_positions.title: Member Blockchain Smart Contract Standardization Group - TC307

profile_positions.description: As startup mentor, helping blockchain startups setting up their business. Working on sustainable blockchain innovations en business models.
profile_positions.title: Startup Mentor

profile_positions.description: Member of the advisory board of Swarm City. Swarm City is the first truly decentralized peer to peer sharing economy project, building their platform on Ethereum. Advisor for blockchain & new insurance (business model) initiatives. https://swarm.city
profile_positions.title: Member of the Advisory Board

profile_positions.description:
The smart contract workgroup of the Dutch Digital Delta (Dutch Blockchain Coalition) works on identifying the educational need and questions with regards to rules and regulations as result of the rise of blockchain and smart contracts and connected to this new business and industry models. The members of the workgroup are various universities, governmental organizations, reguators, law firms, consultancy firms and tech (blockchain) start ups.

The human capital agenda is responsible for identifying knowledge needs and help universities and other educational institutions to update their curricula to prepare their students on DLT implementations and the industry (governance) changes involved as a result.
profile_positions.title: Chairman and Founder Smart Contract Workgroup - Member Human Capital Agenda

profile_positions.description: Helping Ledger Leopard in business development, SSI, process and solution design various running projects.
profile_positions.title: Business Development and Consultancy

profile_positions.description: During my two years as CEO, we grew Ledger Leopard from an investment needing startup to a financial healthy and profit making scale up and leading blockchain solutions provider in the Benelux. During this time, we doubled our client base, tripled our turnover and delivered on many projects in Supply Chain Provenance, Self Sovereign Identity, Healthcare and Media industry.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description: Director Digital Disruption, specialized in Blockchain and Smart Contracts and Business Process Management (Lean Six Sigma Black Belt). Designing new business models for various industries, with a focus on financial industry, legal sector and trade industry, working with a wide range of insurers, bank, law firms and trading companies on how to innovate in a sustainable way and how to stay relevant in the "Fin/insur/legaltech" era as incumbent. Main expertise blockchain and smart contracts (Ethereum, Solidity)
profile_positions.title: Director Blockchain & Smart Contracts

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all non direct related departments within Operations, being Quality department, Project Management Office, Sourcing, Business Continuity Management, Records and Information Management and Facilities:

As Quality and Project management office manager, responsible for all process improvements projects and management of the (both IT and business) project portfolio.
Besides that responsible for sourcing within GEAB - both procurement and contract management.
Responsible for Records and Information Management within the bank.
Futhermore responsible for business continuity management and crisis management.
Also responsible for the facilities and general affairs department.
profile_positions.title: Operations Leader (non direct operations)

profile_positions.description: Managing the Sourcing, Facilities and Operational Excellence teams of GE Artesia Bank
profile_positions.title: Operational Excellence, Sourcing and Facilities Leader
